dc:title: We Go on Record: the CW Resonse to Hiroshima
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Denounces the atomic bombing of Hiroshima and is outraged at the jubilation in the press. Juxtaposes words and images that contrast the evil of the bomb's destruction with God's creative love. Keywords: pacifism, war
